locale.name: en_US
locale.message: Your account is not currently associated with any series. Please choose a series:
Your account does not currently have any roles for these series. Please choose from the actions below:

The Review Guidelines will provide reviewers with criteria for judging a submission's suitability for publication in the Series, and can include any special instructions for preparing an effective and helpful review. In conducting the review, reviewers are presented with with two open text boxes, the first "for author and editor," and the second "for editor." Alternatively, the Series Manager can create a peer review form under Review Forms. In all cases, editors will have the option of including the reviews in corresponding with the author.
Select a publication to register with
There are no publications you may register with on this site.
Click here if you are already registered with this or another publication on this site.
Click here if you are not already registered with this or another publication on this site.
Notified by email on publication of a volume of the series.
Notified by email when a volume of the series is made open access.
Able to submit items to the series.
Willing to conduct peer review of submissions to the series.
The contents of these series will be available in an open access format
Enter your email address to receive immediate notifications of important new content added to the series.
These series have not published any volumes.

To upload a manuscript to this publication, complete the following steps.

  1. On this page, click Browse (or Choose File) which opens a Choose File window for locating the file on the hard drive of your computer.
  2. Locate the file you wish to submit and highlight it.
  3. Click Open on the Choose File window, which places the name of the file on this page.
  4. Click Upload on this page, which uploads the file from the computer to the publication's web site and renames it following the publication's conventions.
  5. Once the submission is uploaded, click Save and Continue at the bottom of this page.
